entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 17
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
RAIN LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
LOWS AROUND 20

PARTLY SUNNY AND COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S
